channel.title: How do I get started running a RSC server?
channel.description:
I've (albeit lazily) looked around for a quick jumpstart, and the one-click server that is stickied has dead links, so where else should I look?
Can anyone recommend a good distro?

item.title: How do I get started running a RSC server?
item.dc:creator: @cleako cleako
item.description:
@cleako wrote:

Yong Min’s Noobscape 3 was a good source.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I get started running a RSC server?
